title: What is this font?
content:
If you know... let me know... thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052256im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sampletext_6498.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sampletext.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052256/http:/typophile.com/files/sampletext.jpg) | 26.87 KB |
author: wnf

comments.content:
There are a lot of Bauhaus-style variations. The closest I could find to this one was [Monolith Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052256/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/abctypes/monolith-sans/) from ABCtypes.

Another idea is [Y2k Neophyte](http://web.archive.org/web/20090615052256/http:/www.dafont.com/y2k-neophyte.font) if you flip the m for your w.

- Mike Yanega
